sub_topic: Probability of a certain type of traffic accident occurring on a road
message_1: What is the probability of a car accident involving only one car occurring on a certain road during a particular hour of the day, given that the historical data shows that this type of accident occurs on the road with a probability of 0.15 per hour?
message_2: The probability of a car accident involving only one car occurring on a certain road during a particular hour of the day, given the historical data, is 0.15 or 15%.
